content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Offshore Pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) and pipe at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5)

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) and multiple pipes connected to it

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0) and multiple pipes connected to it

### Pipe Group at position(x=1.5, y=-6.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming a fluid system with id 201072

### Pipe Group at position(x=3.5, y=-2.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming a fluid system with id 201082

### Pipe Group at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming a fluid system with id 201119 and carrying water

### Pipe Group at position(x=-12.5, y=25.5)
Consists of a single pipe at position(x=-12.5, y=25.5), forming a fluid system with id 201120

### Pipe Group at position(x=-5.5, y=25.5)
Consists of a single pipe at position(x=-5.5, y=25.5), forming a fluid system with id 201121

### Electricity Group
Consists of multiple small electric poles at positions (x=7.5, y=0.5), (x=7.5, y=-0.5), (x=3.5, y=0.5), (x=3.5, y=2.5), (x=7.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target tile is empty before attempting to place an entity
- Check the entity's dimensions and the available space on the map before placing it

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected to each other
- Check the connection points of the entities and the available space on the map before connecting them

### Errors when using fluid systems
- Ensure the fluid system is properly configured and all entities are connected correctly
- Check the fluid box and fluid systems of the entities to avoid overfilling or emptying

### Errors when using electricity
- Ensure the electricity group is properly configured and all poles are connected correctly
- Check the voltage of the electricity group to avoid overloading or underloading
